_header: A the sighs that come from my heart
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 86.
_description: Recollections of love’s joys — four quatrains

BLAdd31922.First Lines: A the syghs þat cum fro my hartThey greue me passyng sore…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …Ther myght no Ioys compare with itvnto my hart as now she shuld

BLRoyApp58.First Lines:
A the sighes come fro my hertthey greue me passynge soreSyth I
                    must fro my loue de partffare well my Ioye fore
                    euermore…
BLRoyApp58.Last Lines:
…As my thynke that I se hur yeteAs wolde to gode that I
                    myghtThere ne myght no Ioyues compare h[?]Vnto my hart to
                    make hyt lyght
